docs: Market system for asset trading and marketplace functionality
This system allows players to:
- List assets for sale
- Purchase assets from other players
- Manage asset listings
- Transfer assets between entities

instructions.name: execute
docs: Main execution function for the Market system

errors.name: NotTheOwner
errors.msg: Seller is not the owner of this asset

types.name: BoltMetadata
docs: Metadata for the component.

types.name: Ownership
docs: Ownership component that tracks which entities own other entities
This component is used to establish ownership relationships between entities in the YieldWars game.
For example, a player entity can own multiple GPU entities, Data Centers, Land Rights, etc.
The component stores a list of the public keys of owned entities along with their types.

fields.name: owner_type
docs: The type of the entity this ownership component is attached to

fields.name: owned_entities
docs: Array of owned entity public keys

fields.name: owned_entity_types
docs: Array of entity types corresponding to owned entities

fields.name: owner_entity
docs: The public key of the entity that owns this entity (if applicable)
This enables bidirectional ownership tracking

types.name: Price
docs: Price component that tracks market values and price history
This component is attached to entities that have market value, such as currencies and assets.
It tracks current price, historical prices, and price change parameters.
Price changes can be influenced by market activity and time-based fluctuations.

fields.name: current_price
docs: Current price in USDC (base currency)

fields.name: previous_price
docs: Previous price for calculating price change

fields.name: last_update_time
docs: Timestamp of last price update

fields.name: min_price
docs: Minimum price allowed

fields.name: max_price
docs: Maximum price allowed

fields.name: volatility
docs: Volatility factor (100 = 1%, 1000 = 10%, etc.)

fields.name: update_frequency
docs: Price update frequency in seconds

fields.name: price_type
docs: Type of the priced entity (uses same enum as Ownership component)

fields.name: price_updates_enabled
docs: Whether price updates are currently enabled

fields.name: price_trend
docs: Price trend direction (-100 to +100, where 0 is neutral)

fields.name: price_history
docs: Array of historical prices (most recent first, max 24 entries)

fields.name: history_index
docs: Index for circular price history array

fields.name: supply_factor
docs: Supply factor affecting price (10000 = neutral)

fields.name: demand_factor
docs: Demand factor affecting price (10000 = neutral)

types.name: Wallet
docs: Wallet component that tracks currency balances for the player
This component stores the balances of different cryptocurrencies
that a player can own in the YieldWars game. It tracks:
- USDC: Base currency used for most transactions
- BTC: Bitcoin, a tradable cryptocurrency with fluctuating value
- ETH: Ethereum, a tradable cryptocurrency with fluctuating value
- SOL: Solana, a tradable cryptocurrency with fluctuating value
- AiFi: Special token produced by GPUs, used for advanced upgrades

fields.name: usdc_balance
docs: Balance of USDC (stablecoin), the base currency

fields.name: btc_balance
docs: Balance of Bitcoin (BTC)

fields.name: eth_balance
docs: Balance of Ethereum (ETH)

fields.name: sol_balance
docs: Balance of Solana (SOL)

fields.name: aifi_balance
docs: Balance of AiFi tokens
